ie.gmit.sw.ai.characters

Class EnemyBrain.EnemyTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • ie.gmit.sw.ai.characters.EnemyBrain.EnemyTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    EnemyBrain

    public class EnemyBrain.EnemyTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    Each enemy has a task attached to it. The task moves the enemy and determines if it's fighting or alive. The traversal algorithm is called from this class.
    Author:
    Ronan

        private void setTraversor(Enemy enemy,
                          Player player)
        Sets which traversal algorithm will be used. This is based on what intelligence level the enemy is. The intelligence levels are spread out evenly.
        Parameters:
